entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swan River 3:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -22.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -28.0°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
